title: OT115: Oberon Thread
summary:
Key ideas:
- The blog post is an open thread and allows readers to post about anything except hot-button political and social topics.
- There are visible and hidden open threads twice a week for readers to engage in discussion.
- The author mentions the comment of the week and explains a new rule to delete comments that only say "first!".

Key learnings:
- The open thread is a way for readers to engage and share information on different topics.
- The comment of the week is a way to highlight insightful comments from readers.
- The author has established a new rule to discourage comments that only say "first!".

Key questions:
- N/A (The post is an open thread and does not contain key questions that the author asks himself.)
